mapper.select: select PLAN_NAME planName from t_qm_plan where PLAN_ID is not null and PLAN_ID = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update t_qm_voice_pool
CHECK_STAFF_ID = #{checkStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_STAFF_NAME = #{checkStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_OPERATE = #{isOperate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
POOL_STATUS = #{poolStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where TOUCH_ID = #{touchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_qm_voice_pool set CHECK_STAFF_NAME = #{checkStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_STAFF_ID = #{checkStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_OPERATE = #{isOperate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POOL_STATUS = #{poolStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where TOUCH_ID = #{touchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
